title: Sanders stresses gun control, calls for assault weapon ban
text:
> Top News Sanders stresses gun control, calls for assault weapon ban Bernie Sanders speaks at the University of Colorado campus in Boulder, Colo., on Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015.
